alert.note: Alert for Onslow (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 28 at 9:36AM EST until further notice by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Newport/Morehead City NC has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Carolina... New River At Gum Branch affecting Onslow County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is currently forecast. * WHERE...New River at Gum Branch. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Water threatens homes at the end of Forest Bluff Drive. Minor farmland flooding along the river occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM EST Thursday the stage was 13.9 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 1245 AM EST.
